name: Halloween Tricks or Treats
description:
In the mood for some Halloween fun? This puzzle game is loaded with tricks and treats to entertain you as you wait for Halloween night. With two modes of play, even the littlest monsters will have fun filling their treat bags in this good "spirited" halloween game. We kept this description short and "sweet" so go ahead and try out this game for free!

*No monsters were harmed in the making of this game.
